messages.content: Tell me how you calculated the answer
I used the multiplication operator (()) to calculate 1234 times 1234, which is equal to 1,795,128.
Can you show me the long multiplication

Sure! Here is a diagram showing the long multiplication algorithm:
```
    1234
   ×   1234
   →   1418702
    1234
    ×   1234
     →  1795128
    1234
    ×   1234
      →  19612240
    1234
    ×   1234
       →  22777312
  1418702 × 19612240
 →  3843904312
  1795128 × 22777312
 →  535106705791912
```
This is a very time-consuming process, but it allows you to perform many multiplications quickly.
